levels.description: Places bombs on up to <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> enemies within Attack Range, prioritizing enemies with the highest HP; After a delay, the bombs will detonate, each dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to nearby enemies and <$ba.stun>Stunning</> them for <@ba.vup>{stun}</> seconds
